Ralph L. Brill (December 19, 1935 – June 21, 2019) was an American legal scholar. He was born in Chicago. Brill was Professor of Law at Chicago-Kent College of Law at the Illinois Institute of Technology. He was Dean of the college from 1970 to 1974. His works helped shape some rules and requirements for the American Bar Association.
Brill died on June 21, 2019 in Chicago at the age of 83.
